dict.acceptation: 武装的；有把手的；有防卫器官的；

sent.orig: In China the armed revolution is fighting the armed counter-revolution.
sent.trans: 在中国，是武装的革命反对武装的反革命。

sent.orig: Europe became therefore an armed camp and peace little more than an armed truce.
sent.trans: 因此，欧洲成为一个武装兵营，而和平和武装戒备中的停战没有多大区别。

sent.orig: The armed forces, however, get a bigger boost.
sent.trans: 军费倒是有长足的增加。

sent.orig: The look of you and your armed companions is enough to frighten the French.
sent.trans: 你和你那些拿枪的人足以把人吓死。

sent.orig: The local farmers had armed themselves with rifles and pistols.
sent.trans: 当地农民已经用步枪和手枪武装起来。
